name: Breathing Fear
description:
Breathing Fear is a non-linear 2D horror game with survival elements. Solve all the secrets of the mysterious house and try not to go crazy with horror.

Making your way through the forest thicket, you find yourself at the door of a mysterious empty mansion. Hiding from bad weather and pursuers, you sneak inside to wait out. But are you destined to make it back?
Uncover all the secrets of the mysterious house and try not to go crazy from the horror that is happening there. Feel the Breath of Fear on you.

In Breathing Fear you will find:
- Intriguing plot. Put together the whole picture of what is happening.
- Several endings. The outcome of the story depends on your choice.
- Non-trivial riddles. Only logic, no accidents.
- The atmosphere of horror. Can pixels scare you?
